description: Ministry of Labour, Trade Union Relations and Sabaragamuwa Development -  Revocation of order made to appoint Mr. T. E. Santharajan as the arbitration of the Settlement of Industrial Dispute between Mr.  C. J. Ranjith and Bank of Ceylon Colombo 01 -  Appointed Mr. K. M. Sarathchandra as the Arbitrator - Order made to appoint Mr. S. Kariyawasam, as the arbitration of the settlement of Industrial Dispute between Water Treatment Plant Technicians Union Ratmalana and National Water supply and Drainage Board Ratmalana
